fen2img[source]

fen2img(fen, board_size=400, piece_style='merida', theme='brown')

convert fen string to image.

fen -- a FEN string board_size -- the width of the chess board piece_style -- support those styles: 'merida', 'case', 'wikipedia', 'alpha', 'uscf', 'condal', 'maya', 'leipzig' theme -- support those themes: 'chesscom', 'brown', 'falken', 'green', 'zeit', 'informator', 'sportverlag', 'beyer', 'blue'

{% endraw %}
